name: Dimilix VN
description:
Dimilix VN

One bright morning in Faerghus, you, Dimitri Alexandre Blaiddyd, wake up next to your two cats. What do you do?

Note: The web version is known to have lag/performance issues and I highly recommend downloading one of the executables below, which are more stable.

Project information:

  • Rated G
  • Originally coded using Ink, ported to Ren'py as a practical exercise
  • Has 2 legitimate endings (+2 randomized joke endings)
  • Should not take more than 5 minutes to play

Sample Screenshots:

Credits:

  • Programmer/Writer: DimensionSlip
  • Artist: pluma_azurea
  • Music: PeriTune
  • SFX: Orange Free Sounds

Original VN (Text-only): https://dimensionslip.tumblr.com/dimilix-vn

If you enjoyed this, please consider retweeting the advertisement post on Twitter and/or sharing your thoughts with me!
